0.name: An Extravagant House
0.description: You stand at the entrance to a large manor house.  All around you, people bustle and work.  Through the open door, you can hear someone singing inside.

1.name: Music Room
1.description: Making your way towards the signing, you find the lord of the manor at a grand piano.  He is in the middle of a rendition of "Greensleeves" when you enter
